summary: DODGE HAS VARYING RECALL 96V099000 ON HYDRAULIC BOAST ABS SYSTEM: UNLIMITED ON BOAST PUMP, 100,000 MI ON ACCUMULATOR AND TRANSDUCER VALVES. DODGE REPLACES PUMP AND WARN THAT PUMP WILL FAIL.  IF FAILED ACCUMULATOR AND TRANSDUCERS ARE NOT REPLACED: COST $850. SYSTEM WILL SUFFER INTEGRAL FAILURE.       *PH    *NLM    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**765657
